text: Sir Timothy James Alan Colman (19 September 1929 â€“ 9 September 2021) was a British businessman. He was the Lord Lieutenant of Norfolk from 1978 until 2004.Lord-Lieutenant for Norfolk Colman was born in Henstead, Norfolk, England. Colman died on 9 September 2021, at the age of 91.'Enormous contribution' - Norfolk's love for Sir Timothy Colman ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English businesspeople Category:People from Norfolk Category:Lord-lieutenants
